meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7984.

td.p: Josh Archibald-Seiffer, a music director and pianist from Seattle, Washington
Jessica Efron Sauer, a bookkeeper from Munster, Indiana
James Holzhauer, a professional sports gambler from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 20-day cash winnings total $1,528,012)

tr.td: STATE SCHOOL, THAT GREAT SCHOOL
NONFICTION
WORLD OF SPORT
HEY, "B.B."
AN EPIC
OF BIBLICAL PROPORTIONS

(including 3 DDs),

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
